title: How to play games in LG smart tv - Quora

response.answer_text: Prerequisites: A gaming console - Xbox or PlayStationA pair Dual Play Glasses- sold separately.A game with 2 player split screen mode.Procedure: Connect your game console to your TV and launch the game in 2 player mode (split screen).Press the home button of your smart remote.Click on the Settings (cog) icon.Go to the Picture menu > Dual PlayToggle Dual Play OffSelect the Dual Play Mode: Top and Bottom, Side by Side.References: LG Smart TV (WebOS) - How to enable the Dual Play modeLG Smart TV - Downloading Apps
